languages.text: {n}Друкари медлит. А затем, переглянувшись со стоящими рядом кабалитами, медленно вытаскивает оружие и поднимает его.{/n} "Довольно пресмыкаться перед обреченным... лучше издохнуть на воле и под своим флагом, чем служить игрушкой боли для мертвеца".

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари прищуривает глаз.{/n} "Я думал, что иду за тем, кто может вести кабал... но, кажется, я просчитался. Какая удача, что здесь, вдали от других архонтов Черного Сердца и ведьм культа, никто не узнает, что произошло с тобой и твоей охраной..."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари медлит. А затем, переглянувшись со стоящими рядом кабалитами, медленно вытаскивает оружие и поднимает его.{/n} "Довольно пресмыкаться перед обреченным... лучше издохнуть на воле и под своим флагом, чем служить игрушкой боли для мертвеца".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed..... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed..... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari zögert und tauscht Blicke mit den Mitgliedern der Kabale in der Nähe aus. Er zieht langsam seine Waffe und hebt sie.{/n} "Genug Gebuckel vor dem Todgeweihten ... Ich sterbe lieber frei und nach meinen eigenen Bedingungen, als das Spielzeug eines Toten zu bleiben."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari zögert und tauscht Blicke mit den Mitgliedern der Kabale in der Nähe aus. Er zieht langsam seine Waffe und hebt sie.{/n} "Genug Gebuckel vor dem Todgeweihten ... Ich sterbe lieber frei und nach meinen eigenen Bedingungen, als das Spielzeug eines Toten zu bleiben."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔犹豫片刻，与身边的阴谋团战士交换了一下目光，随后慢慢抽出武器，高高举起。{/n}“我已经受够了卑躬屈膝……我宁可自由自在地死，也不想继续当死人的玩物。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔犹豫片刻，与身边的阴谋团战士交换了一下目光，随后慢慢抽出武器，高高举起。{/n}“我已经受够了卑躬屈膝……我宁可自由自在地死，也不想继续当死人的玩物。”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari hésite, échange des regards avec les Kabalites à ses côtés, dégaine lentement l'arme et la soulève.{/n} « Assez rampé devant les condamnés... Mieux vaut mourir libre comme je l'entends que demeurer l'esclave d'un mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari hésite, échange des regards avec les Kabalites à ses côtés, dégaine lentement l'arme et la soulève.{/n} « Assez rampé devant les condamnés... Mieux vaut mourir libre comme je l'entends que demeurer l'esclave d'un mort. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari titubea y se mira con los otros Kabalistas cercanos. Desenvaina lentamente su arma y la levanta.{/n} «Basta de arrastrarnos ante un condenado... Es mejor morir libre por mi cuenta que seguir siendo el juguete de un muerto».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari titubea y se mira con los otros Kabalistas cercanos. Desenvaina lentamente su arma y la levanta.{/n} «Basta de arrastrarnos ante un condenado... Es mejor morir libre por mi cuenta que seguir siendo el juguete de un muerto».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}デュカーリはためらい、そして近くにいたカバライトと目を合わせるとゆっくりと剣を引き抜いて構えた。{/n}「運が尽きる前の命乞いは十分だ…死人のおもちゃでい続けるくらいなら、自分が思うように自由に死ぬ方がいい」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリはためらい、そして近くにいたカバライトと目を合わせるとゆっくりと剣を引き抜いて構えた。{/n}「運が尽きる前の命乞いは十分だ…死人のおもちゃでい続けるくらいなら、自分が思うように自由に死ぬ方がいい」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: {n}Drukhari tereddüt ediyor, ardından yakınlarındaki Kabalistlerle bakışıyor ve silahını kınından çıkarıp kaldırıyor.{/n} "Sonu gelmiş olanın önünde diz çökmek yersiz. Bir ölünün oyuncağı olarak kalacağıma; özgürce, kendi istediğim şekilde ölürüm daha iyi."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari hesitates, then exchanges glances with the nearby Kabalites, slowly unsheathes the weapon, and raises it.{/n} "Enough grovelling before the doomed... Better to die free and on my own terms than to remain a dead man's plaything."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari tereddüt ediyor, ardından yakınlarındaki Kabalistlerle bakışıyor, silahını kınından çıkarıyor ve kaldırıyor.{/n} "Sonu gelmiş olanın önünde diz çökmek artık yersiz. Ölü birinin oyuncağı olarak kalmaktansa, özgürce ve kendi istediğim şekilde ölürüm daha iyi."
traits.speaker: Karael
